data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Olomoucký, Czechia to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Olomoucký, Czechia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Olomoucký, Czechia.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Olomoucký.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Olomoucký, Czechia to the gospel today.
Lord, please remember the Turk people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, help the 4,686 believers in Olomoucký to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 631,014 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, make bold the prophets in Olomoucký, Czechia so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.section_summary:
the state of Olomoucký, Czechia has a population of 635,700.

We estimate Olomoucký has 4,686 people who might know Jesus, 165,908 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 465,106 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 135 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Olomoucký, Czechia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
